snippet: Mr. Rylance will play Thomas Cromwell, the powerful minister to Henry VIII, in a television adaptation of Hilary Mantel’s Booker Prize-winning novels “Wolf Hall” and “Bring Up the Bodies.”
abstract: Mr. Rylance will play Thomas Cromwell, the powerful minister to Henry VIII, in a television adaptation of Hilary Mantel’s Booker Prize-winning novels “Wolf Hall” and “Bring Up the Bodies.”

headline.main: 'Wolf Hall' Mini-Series With Mark Rylance Is Coming to PBS's 'Masterpiece'
headline.print_headline: ‘Wolf Hall’ and Rylance Will Come to PBS
